name: Paper Trail (Testing Game Concepts)
description:
This current scene is set up to test out and develop ideas I want to to work on for a game.  I am really interested in the player being able to interact with the environment and it really bugs me that games seem to neglect that over the years.  I know it can be very taxing on a game to have a fully interactable and/or destrucible environment but that is what I am focusing on trying to put more work into.  I will update this game as often as I think there are noticeable newer features and am excited to share my progress!

  This project is posted mainly as an easy way to share games with some friends.
